Title: Enacts the  civil justice protection act (CJPA)
Summary: Enacts the "civil justice protection act (CJPA)"; requires that no person shall waive a series of rights and procedures when purchasing goods and services.
LawCode: Add ยง393-dd, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to enacting the "civil justice protection act"
